00017 W.Creature = function(args){var self = this;
00018   // creature ID; -1 for wall
00019   this.id = 0;
00020   // position coordinate on a world
00021   this.col = 0;
00022   this.row = 0;
00023   this.act = 'hide';
00024   this.actLast = '';
00025   this.dir = 'south';
00026   // u(nit) size; 1 unit = 1 * world.unit
00027   this.uwidth = 1;
00028   this.uheight = 1;
00029   this.udepth = 1;
00030   // internal reference only (need to be private)
00031   this.frame = 0;
00032   this.maxTop = 0;
00033   this.maxLeft = 0;
00034   // sprite animation speed - the smaller, the smoother animation (more CPU time)
00035   this.speed = 6;
00036   // internal reference only (need to be private)
00037   this.actQueue = [];
00038   this.skills = [];
00039   this.add(new W.Skill());
00040   // creature-algorithm
00041   this.algo = function(){};
00042   // visual components
00043   this.img = document.createElement('img');
00044   this.img.title = this.id + ' : '+ this.name;
00045   this.img = W.style('img', 'position:absolute;left:-1000px;');
00046   this.body = W.style('div', 'position:absolute;top:0px;left:0px;overflow:hidden;');
00047   this.body.appendChild(this.img);
00048 
00055   this.resize = function(unit){
00056     this.width = this.uwidth * unit;
00057     this.height = this.uheight * unit;
00058     this.depth = this.udepth * unit;
00059     this.body.style.width = this.width +'px';
00060     this.body.style.height = this.height +'px';
00061   };
00062 
00063   // extend/override constructor w/ passed args object
00064   for(var i in args)
00065     eval('this.'+ i +' = args["'+ i +'"];');
00066 };

00082 W.Creature.prototype.add = function(skill){
00083   // allow skill to refer creature it added to
00084   skill.creature = this;
00085   this.skills[skill.name] = skill;
00086 };

00096 W.Creature.prototype.clone = function(){
00097   var clone = new W.Creature();
00098   for(var i in this){
00099     // exclude the HTMLElement members for preventing obj cross referencing
00100     if(i != 'body' && i != 'img')
00101       eval('clone.'+ i +' = this["'+ i +'"];');
00102   }
00103   return clone;
00104 };

00115 //W.Creature.prototype.action = function(act){var self = this;
00116 W.Creature.prototype.action = function(){var self = this;
00117   // manage sprite
00118   this.skills[this.act].animate();
00119   // move creature
00120   var bodyPos = 0;
00121   if(this.dir == 'north' || this.dir == 'south'){
00122     bodyPos = parseInt(this.body.style.top);
00123   }else bodyPos = parseInt(this.body.style.left);
00124   // handle dir
00125   switch(this.dir){
00126     case 'north':
00127       bodyPos -= this.speed;
00128       if(bodyPos >  -this.speed){
00129         changeRow(bodyPos);
00130       }else this.algo(true); // hit the edge
00131       break;
00132     case 'south':
00133       bodyPos += this.speed;
00134       if(bodyPos < this.maxTop + this.speed){
00135         changeRow(bodyPos);
00136       }else this.algo(true);
00137       break;
00138     case 'east':
00139       bodyPos += this.speed;
00140       if(bodyPos < this.maxLeft + this.speed){
00141         changeCol(bodyPos);
00142       }else this.algo(true);
00143       break;
00144     case 'west':
00145       bodyPos -= this.speed;
00146       if(bodyPos > -this.speed){
00147         changeCol(bodyPos);
00148       }else this.algo(true);
00149       break;
00150   };
00151 
00152   //@TODO handle multi-unit creatures
00153   function changeCol(left){var value = 0;
00154     left = (left < 0)?0:left;
00155     if(self.dir == 'east'){
00156       value = Math.ceil(left / self.world.unit);
00157     }else if(self.dir == 'west') value = Math.floor(left / self.world.unit);
00158     // on column change
00159     if(value != self.col){
00160       var other = self.world.at(self.row, value);
00161       // other creature detected
00162       if(other){
00163         self.algo(other);
00164         return;
00165       }else{
00166         // exec creature algorithm
00167         self.algo();
00168         self.world.matrix[self.row][value] = self.id;
00169         self.world.matrix[self.row][self.col] = -1;
00170         self.col = value;  // change col prop.
00171         //if(!checkOutNextAct()) return;
00172       }
00173     }
00174     self.body.style.left = left +'px';  // move body
00175   };
00176 
00177   function changeRow(top){var value = 0;
00178     top = (top < 0)?0:top;
00179     if(self.dir == 'south'){
00180       value = Math.ceil(top / self.world.unit);
00181     }else if(self.dir == 'north') value = Math.floor(top / self.world.unit);
00182     // on row change
00183     if(value != self.row){
00184       var other = self.world.at(value, self.col);
00185       if(other){
00186         self.algo(other);  // other creature detected
00187         return;
00188       }else{
00189         // exec creature algorithm
00190         self.algo();
00191         self.world.matrix[value][self.col] = self.id;
00192         self.world.matrix[self.row][self.col] = -1;
00193         self.row = value;  // change row prop.
00194         // adjust zIndex
00195         self.body.style.zIndex = value;
00196       }
00197     }
00198     self.body.style.top = top +'px';  // move body
00199   };
00200 };

00211 W.Creature.prototype.getAbsDir = function(rDir){
00212   var absDir = ['north', 'east', 'south', 'west'];
00213   var relDir = ['front', 'right', 'rear', 'left'];
00214   // bypass it if the argument is absDir
00215   if (absDir.indexOf(rDir) != -1)
00216     return rDir;
00217   // handle random turn
00218   if(rDir == 'random')
00219      return absDir[Math.floor(Math.random() * 4)];
00220   // manage circular array
00221   numOfTurns = absDir.indexOf(this.dir);
00222   for (var i = 0; i < numOfTurns; ++i) {
00223     var first = absDir.shift();
00224     absDir.push(first);
00225   }
00226   return absDir[relDir.indexOf(rDir)];
00227 };

00236 W.Creature.prototype.doAtoB = function(A, B){
00237   // do skill-specific action
00238   A.to(B);
00239   this.act = A.name;
00240   // change sprite image only if its needed
00241   if(this.img.src != A.img)
00242     this.img.src = A.img;
00243 };

00253 W.Creature.prototype.isAonB = function(A, B){
00254   // handle direct coordination
00255   if(B.split(':').length != 0){
00256     var coor = B.split(':');
00257     return (A == this.world[coor[0]][coor[1]]);
00258   }
00259   // convert relative dir.('front',..) to absolute dir.('north',..)
00260   while(true){
00261     switch(B){
00262       case 'north': return (A == this.world[this.col][--this.row]);
00263       case 'east': return (A == this.world[++this.col][this.row]);
00264       case 'south': return (A == this.world[this.col][++this.row]);
00265       case 'west': return (A == this.world[--this.col][this.row]);
00266       case 'front':
00267       case 'right':
00268       case 'rear':
00269       case 'left': B = this.getAbsDir(B);
00270     }
00271   };
00272 };
